Summary: The lights were seen to the south west of Okotoks Alberta over the mountains they came and went started with one then three .
divs: Sighting DetailsThe sighting was at midnight by my wife and daughter,are liveing room window faces west.They started looking after receaveing a call from a friend to look out side to the west they went out side stod on are front porch.They looked up to the area they were told to look and there first was one then two more appeard,they were side by side then two just vanished then came back this time on top of one another they were there for around a hr then just disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Okotoks
This sighting has never been favorited.
